duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, develop, implement, and analyze technical products and systems
Perform engineering design evaluations and recommend alterations to development and design to improve product quality
Install, troubleshoot, and maintain products/equipment; identify, analyze, and repair product failures
Determine and recommend products or services that best fit customers' needs
Use various software systems and applications to troubleshoot issues and equipment related to network connectivity and configuration

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering or a related field (Master's preferred)
